docs.text: Overview For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. Android iOS fun foo ( a : Int = 0 , b : String = "" ) { ... } let individualScores = [ 75 , 43 , 103 , 87 , 12 ] var teamScore = 0 for score in individualScores { if score > 50 { teamScore += 3 } else { teamScore += 1 } } print ( teamScore ) // Prints "11" Example Android iOS #include <stdio.h> int main ( void ) { printf ( "Hello world! \n " ); return 0 ; } #include <iostream> int main ( void ) { std :: cout << "Hello world!" << std :: endl ; return 0 ; }
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. Android iOS fun foo ( a : Int = 0 , b : String = "" ) { ... } let individualScores = [ 75 , 43 , 103 , 87 , 12 ] var teamScore = 0 for score in individualScores { if score > 50 { teamScore += 3 } else { teamScore += 1 } } print ( teamScore ) // Prints "11"
